nodes.documentation:
@title Crowdsale for MDX tokens
 @author Stichting BlockMedx
nodes.name: MDXCrowdsale

nodes.documentation: @notice Buys MDX tokens from sent WAN and provides them to the sender.

@notice Buys MDX tokens from sent WAN.
 @param _to The recipient address for the MDX tokens
nodes.name: buyTokens

nodes.documentation:
@notice Gets the total amount of tokens remaining available for sale.
 @return The amount of remaining tokens in units.
nodes.name: totalRemainingTokens
roundRemainingTokens

nodes.documentation:
@notice Gets the amount of seconds left in the current round
 @return The amount of time remaining for the current round in seconds
nodes.name: roundRemainingTime

nodes.documentation:
@notice Gets the current round
 @return The current round starting from 0 (presale)
nodes.name: currentRound
getInfo
